column2: Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development

column1: a: Data refer to 2018 or the most recent year available.
b: Based on Barro and Lee (2018).
c: Updated by HDRO using Barro and Lee (2018) estimates.
d: Updated by HDRO based on data from United Nations Childrenís Fund Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys for 2006 and 2018.
e: Updated by HDRO based on data from ICF Macro Demographic and Health Surveys for 2006 and 2018.
f: Based on data from the national statistical office.
g: Based on data from OECD (2018).
h: Updated by HDRO based on data from UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2019).
j: Imputed mean years of schooling for Austria.
k: Updated by HDRO based on Syrian Center for Policy Research (2017).
